NewsText: Nan ne muka kawo karshen labarai da rahotannin na wannan rana
Sai ku kasance tare da mu a gobe Litinin idan rai ya kai mu domin sake kawo muku wasu labarai da rahotannin na musamman
Rahotanni sun ce tawagar bincike ta Saudiyya a Jami’ar Imam Abdulrahman bin Faisal ta samar da rigakafin korona kuma suna fatan fara gwajin rigakafin ba da dadewa ba

Jaridar Saudiyya da ake bugawa a London Al-Sharq al-Awsat ce ta bayar da rahoton a ranar Asabar inda ta ce tawagar wacce mace ke jagoranta, Farfesa Iman al-Mansour ta kammala gwajin farko kuma an har an wallafa sakamakon binciken na kimiya
Yanzu ana jiran tabbatar da ingancin rigakafin da nufin samun lasisin amfani da rigakafin a Saudiyya
Ma’aikatar ilimi ta Saudiyya ce ta ɗauki nauyin gudanar da aikin binciken
Tuni dai Saudiyya ta ce za ta kaddamar da aikin rigakafi a ƙasar na kamfanin Pfizer-BioNtech
Babban hafsan sojojin Najeriya, Janar Tukur Buratai, ya yaba wa dakarunsa da suka kwato sansanin sojoji a yankin arewa maso gabashin kasar da mayaƙan jihadi suka yi iƙirarin kwace wa

Wani mai magana da yawun rundunar sojin ya ce sojojin sama sun taka rawar gani, tare da kai hare-hare wajen fatattakar mayaƙan da suka abka wa sansanin  ɗauke da muggan makamai domin kwace sansanin da ke Marte a jihar Borno
Rahotanni sun ce an shafe tsawon sa’a takwas ana gwabza fada tsakanin mayaƙan ISWAP da ta balle daga Boko Haram da kuma sojin Najeriya
ISWAP ta ce ta tarwatsa garin tare da kone sansanin da kuma kashe sojoji da dama
Gwamnatin Najeriya ta ce dole a yi wa jami’an diflomasiya rijistar lambar NIN
Ministan sadarwa Dakta Isa Ibrahim Pantami, ne ya bayar da umurnin samar da cibiyar yin rijistar ga jami’an diflomasiyya a ma’aikatar harakokin wajen Najeriya a cikin wata sanarwa
Sanarwar ta ce a ranar Talata ne 19 ga Janairun wannan watan za a samar da wurinaikin yin rijistar a ma’aikatar harakokin waje
Ministan ya ce lambar ta sheda wajibi ce ga ƴan ƙasashen waje da za su shafe shekara biyu ko fiye a ƙasar
Kafofin yada labaran gwamnati a Sudan sun ce aƙalla mutum 48 aka kashe a rikicin ƙabilanci a yankin Darfur, wanda aka fara ranar Asabar
Rikicin ya fara ne lokacin da aka daba wa wani mutum wuka ya mutu har lahira a El- Geneina, babban birnin jihar Darfur ta Yamma, lamarin da ya haifar da rikici
Mahukuntan yankin sun sanya dokar hana fitar dare a duk fadin jihar; kuma Firaninistan Sudan, Abdalla Hamdok, ya tura wata babbar tawaga zuwa Darfur don binciken rikicin
Irin wannan rikici a El -Geneina a shekarar da ta gabata ya yi sanadiyyar asarar daruruwan rayuka
NEMAƳan kasuwar Ijesha a birnin Legas sun tafka asara bayan da gobara ta lakume shagunansu da dama
Rahotanni sun ce gobarar ta ƙone shaguna 14 da lalata 48, sannan kuma ta yi barna a gidajen  mazauna kusa da kasuwar
Bayanai sun ce ƴan kasuwa sama da 60 al’amarin ya shafa da kuma gidajen mazauna kasuwar 28
An bayyana cewa wutar ta tashi ne da misalin ƙarfe biyar na yamma kuma sai da aka shafe sa’a huɗu kafin aka ci ƙarfinta
Zuwa yanzu babu rahoton rasa rai ko rauni amma gobarar ta janyo asara mai dimbin yawa
Shugaban adawar Uganda  Bobi Wine ya ce rayuwarsa na cikin hatsari bayan zaben ranar Alhamis da ya ba  Yoweri Museveni nasara
"Ina tsoron rayuwata da ta matata," in ji Bobi Wine
Ya shaida wa BBC cewa ba zai amince da sakamakon zaɓen hukumar zaɓe ba
Ya kuma ce an hana shi fita daga gidansa wanda aka kewaye da jami'an tsaro
Rikici dai ya mamaye zaɓn Uganda inda da dama suka mutu
Kawancen da Saudiyya ke jagoranta a Yemen ya ce ya harbo wasu jirage marar matuka na ƴan tawayen Houthi da ke shirin kai hari a ƙasar
Rikicin Yamen ya kazanc4e tun watan Maris din 2015 bayan da Saudiyya da ƙawayenta suka kaddamar da farmaki kan ƴan tawayen Houthi mayakan da suka kwace ikon babban birnin Yemen Sanaa
Rikicin Yemen ya jefa miliyoyan ƴan ƙasar cikin mawuyacin hali na yunwa baya ga dubbai da aka kashe
Hankalin duniya zai karkata ga wasan hamayya tsakanin Liverpool da Manchester United da manyan ƙungiyoyin biyu na Ingila za su fafata a yau Lahadi
Za a yi wasan ne a Anfield gidan Liverpool
Baya ga farfaɗo da tsohuwar adawar da ke tsakaninsu, ana ganin wasan zai yi zafi saboda ƙungiyoyin biyu ke jagorancin teburin Premier
Karon farko kenan da manyan ƙungiyoyin biyu za su fafata a matsayin na ɗaya da na biyu a teburin Premier tun 1997
United ta ɗare tebur ne bayan wasannin farkon shekara kuma karon farko kenan tun zamanin Sir Alex Ferguson shekarar da ya yi ritaya a 2013
Sojojin Najeriya sun musanta rahotannin da ke cewa mayaƙan da ke iƙirarin jihadi da ke da alaƙa da kungiyar IS sun mamaye wani sansaninsu a jihar Borno da ke arewa maso gabashin kasar a daren Juma’a
sun yi wa mayaƙan kwanton bauna sannan suka kaddamar masu da hari, inda suka lalata motocinsu da ke dauƙe da makamai guda bakwai
Kungiyar da aka fi  sani da sunan ISWAP, tana ci gaba da kai hare-hare a arewa maso gabashin Najeriya inda take kai wa sojoji da fararen hula hari
‘Yan sanda a Kabul, babban birnin Afghanistan, sun ce ƴan bindiga sun harbe wasu alƙalai biyu, dukkaninsu mata, yayin da ake ci gaba da yin kisa a ƙasar
An kashe su ne yayin da suke kan hanyar zuwa wurin aiki
Ba a san waɗanda suka kai harin ba
An fi zargin Taliban, amma ƙungiyar ba ta fito ta yi iƙirarin ɗaukar alhakin hare-haren ba
Ana kai hare-haren ne duk da tattaunawar sulhu ta zaman lafiya da ake a Doha tsakanin wakilan gwamnatin Afghanistan da Taliban
Alƙalumman da hukumar daƙile cutuka masu yaɗuwa a Najeriya NCDC ta fitar sun bayyana cewa an samu ƙarin mutum 1598 da suka kamu da korona a ƙasar
Yawan masu kamuwa da cutar sai ƙaruwa suke inda a ranar Juma'a aka samu sama da mutum 1800 suka kamu adadi mafi yawa tun ɓullar cutar a Najeriya
Alƙalumman sun kuma nuna cewa cutar ta kashe ƙarin mutum bakawai a ranar Asabar inda yanzu yawan waɗanda cutar ta yi ajalinsu a Najeriya suka 1420
Muna maku maraba da kasancewa da mu a wannan shafin inda za mu kawo labarai da rahotanni kai tsaye kan abubuwan da ke faruwa a Najeriya da sassan duniya
Nan ne muka kawo karshen labarai da rahotannin namu na yau
Ni Nasidi Adamu Yahaya na ke cewa mu hadu gobe idan Allah ya kaimu
Hakan zai ba shi damar tafiya Istanbul a kwanaki masu zuwa
Hajiya Fatima kanwa ce ga tsohon shugaban mulkin sojan Najeriya Janar Sani Abacha
Baya ga ta'aziyya ga Sanata Lado, Shugaba Buhari ya kuma yi ta'aziyya ga iyalan marigayi  Abacha da 'yan uwansa da kuma al'umar jihar Kano

Ministan lafiya na Pakistan Faisal Sultan ya ce ta ba da umarnin gaggawa na amfani da rigakafin Covid-19 da jami'ar Oxford da kuma AstraZeneca suka samar, wanda zai zama na farko da aka amince da shi a kasar

Tarayyar Turai ta dakatar da kasafin kudin taimakon da take bai wa Habasha wanda yakai yuro miliyan 88 kwatankwacin dala miliyan 107, har sai an kyale kungiyoyin bayar da agaji sun shiga da kayan agaji ga mutanen da suka makale a yankin Tigray sakamakon rikici

Cikin wani sako da ya wallafa a ranar Juma’a babban jami’in diflomasiyya na kungiyar Josep Borrel ya ce akwai bukatar Firaiminista Abiy Ahmed ya yi duk abin da zai iya yanzu domin kawo karshen wannan rikici
Ofishin Abiy bai mayar da martini ba game da wannan bukata

Hukumomi a Najeriya na gargaɗin kan yadda cutar ke ƙara bazuwa tare da kira ga ƴn ƙasar su mutunta matakan kariya domin daƙile bazuwarta musamman bayar da tazara da saka abin rufe baki da hanci a cikin taron jama'a
Amma hotunan zaɓen ƙananan hukumomin Kano sun nuna ba a kiyaye matakan ba
Ko da yake wasu sun bi layin zaɓen sanye da takunkumi amma da dama ba su saka takunkumin ba

Mayaƙa da ke da alaƙa da ƙungiyar IS reshen Afirka mai da’awar jihadi sun kwace ikon wani sansanin soji a jihar Borno da ke arewa maso gabashi bayan sashe dare suna musayar wuta, kamar yadda kamfanin dillacin labarai na AFP ya ruwaito
Zuwa yanzu dai babu wani cikakken bayani game da harin kuma rundunar sojin Najeriya ba ta fitar da sanarwa bagame da harin
Yankin ya sha fama da hare-haren Boko Haram inda aka kashe dubban mutane da rama miliyoyi da gidajensu
Al'ummar Kano na zaɓen ƙananan hukumomi amma rahotanni sun ce wurare da dama an samu tsaikun fitar kayan zaɓe
Gwamnan Jihar Abdullahi Umar Ganduje ya kada ƙuri'arsa ne a ƙauyensa na Ganduje, yayin da kuma mataimakinsa ya kaɗ ƙuri'arsa a Gawuna Nasarawa
Sai dai wakilin BBC a Kano ya ce akwai ƙarancin fitar masu yin zaɓen
Kamfanin Shell da Total sun sayar da wani wani ɓangare na rijiyoyin hako mai a Najeriya
Kamfanin hamshakin attajirin Najeriya Tony Elumelu ne ya saye kashi 45 na rijiyoyin wanda zai ci gaba da aiki a madadin gwamnatin Najeriya wacce har yanzu ke da kaso mai yawa na hannun jari
Ya kuma karbi kashi 10 na Total da kaso biyar na Agip, wanda yanzu yake da kashi 45 na mallakar kason kamfanonin uku
Sanarwar dakamfanin TNOG ya fitar ya ce rijiyoyin suna sama da ganga 27,000 a rana
Shell wanda ya shafe shekaru sama da 60 yana aikin hako mai a Najeriyai ya yanke shawarar sayar da ɓangarensa ne saboda saɓani da al’ummar yankin Neja Delta
Ana sa ran nan da ƴan kwanaki Saudiyya za ta buɗe ofishin jekadancinta a Qatare bayan sasantawa da suka yi a makon da ya gabata
Ministan harakokin wajen Saudiyya Minister Faisal bin Farhan ne ya bayyana manema labarai a Riyadh cewa nan ba dadewa ba Saudiyya za ta buɗe ofishinta a Qatar
Saudiyya da Daular Larabawa da Bahrain da Masar sun ƙaƙaba takunkumin kasuwanci ga Qatar tun a 2017 kan zarginta da taimakawa ta’adanci, zargin da Qatar ta musanta
hugaban ƙungiyar Taliban a Afghanistan ya fitar da wata doka inda ya buƙaci shugabannin ƙungiyar da kwamandojinsa su haƙura da auren mata da yawa, yana mai cewa “hakan zai janyo suka daga makiyanmu
”Musulunci ya amince maza su auri mata huɗu kuma ba a haramta auren mata da yawa ba a Afghanistan da Pakistan da sauran ƙasashen Musulmi
Yaancin shugabannin Taliban suna da mata fiye da ɗaya, amma sabuwar dokar ba ta shafi waɗanda suka riga suka auri mata fiye da ɗaya ba

Dokar da shugaban Taliban a Afghanistan Mullah Hibatullah, ya fitar ba ta haramta auren mace ta biyu ba ko ta uku kuma auren mace ta hudu, amma ya yi gargadin cewa yawan kudaden da ake kashe wajen biki na iya janyo suka daga abokan hamayyar Taliban
An fara aikin rigakafi mafi girma a fadin duniya, inda Indiya ke fatan yi wa yan ƙasarta miliyan 300 rigakafin korona nan da watanni masu zuwa
Hukumomi sun ce za su mayar da hankali wajen farawa da ma'aikatan lafiya da ke kan gaba a yaƙi da annobar
Kawo yanzu an samar da cibiyoyin yin rigakafin dubu uku a faɗin ƙasar
Masu suka na zargin gwamnati da yin riga malam masallaci wajen amincewa da allurar mai suna Covaxin, wadda aka samar a cikin gida
Ma'aikatar cikin gidan Faransa ta sanar da rufe masallatai 9 a ƙasar, yawancinsu a birnin Paris, waɗanda ke cikin wuraren ibada guda 18 da ake sa ido akansu
Hukumomi sun ce an rufe masallatan ne saboda dalilai na gudanarwa da kuma rashin bin ka'idoji na tsaro
A makwanin da suka  gabata, Faransa ta kaddamar da aikin sa ido 34 a wuraren ibadar musulmi
Bobi Wine ya bayyana zaɓen a matsayin shirme, tare da yin alƙwarin gabatar da ƙwararan hujjujin da za su nunawa duniya irin murɗiyar da aka yi
Jaridar New Vision ta gwamnati ta bayar da rahoton cewa kusan rabin mambobin majalisar ministocin sun rasa kujerunsu, ciki har da mataimakin shugaban kasar Edward Ssekandi
Shafin sada zumunta na WhatsAPP ya tsawaita wa'adin da ya ba masu mu'amala da shi na amincewa da mika bayanan sirrinsu
Miliyoyin masu amfani da shafin a fadin duniya ne suka yi wa wannan shiri tutsu, har ma suka koma amfani da wasu shafukan masu hamayya da Whatsapp kamar Signal da Telegram
Alƙalumman hukumar dakile cutuka masu yaɗuwa ta NCDC a Najeriya sun bayyana cewa karin mutum 1867 suka kamu da korona a ranar Juma'a, adadi mafi girma tun ɓullar cutar a ƙasar
Kuma alƙalumman sun nuna cewa cutar ta kashe mutum takwas cikin sa'a 24 a Najeriya
Hakan ya nuna cutar na ci gaba da bazuwa a Najeriya bayan ta sake dawowa a ƙasar
KANO STATE GOVERNMENTA yau Asabar ne ake gudanar da zaɓen ƙananan hukumomi a 44 a jihar Kano da ke arewacin Najeriya
Za a gudnaar da zaben ne a runfunar zabe 8084 a ƙanaana hukumomi 44 na jihar
Shugaban hukumar zaɓe Farfesa Garba Ibrahim Sheka ya ce tuni suka rarraba kayan zaben
Sai dai zuwa yanzu wasu rahotanni sun bayyana cewa an yi jinkiri sosai wajen fara zaben
Rundunar ƴan sandan jihar ta ce kimanin jami’anta 10,000 ta baza domin samar da tsaro ga masu zabe
Haka kuma koyaushe adabin Hausawa yana kokarin tafiya da duk wani abu da al'ummar ta karu da shi sabo, daga wasu al'ummomin tare da hadawa da nata
Abin lura dai a nan shi ne adabin al'umma yana bunkasa ne idan wannan al'umma tana cudanya da wasu al'ummomin tana karuwa da hikimomin sarrafa rayuwa na al'umma tana kara wa a kan nata

Rubutaccen kagaggen labari rubutu ne da aka yi a shimfide ta sigar shafuka ko ya zo a tsari na zanguna, wanda ya kunshi labarin da ba lalle ya auku ba amma kuma akasari ana tsara shi a kan rayuwa ta zahiri, da nufin isar da wani saqo ga al'umma

Za a kuma iya bayyana shi da wallafa da ake baje kolin hikimomi a zube, ba a tsari na waka ba, ba wasan kwaikwayo ba, ba kuma a siga ta alkaluman lissafi ba, sai dai yakan zo a zube, da zummar sadar da wata manufa da mawallafi ya kirkira
Wannan takarda ta yi tsokaci ne kan samuwa da yawaitar wani nau'in adabi na kagaggun labarai ta yadda ake wata su a shafukan sada zumunta na intanet

Haka kuma takardar hannuka mai sanda ce ga marubuta da masu sha'awar tsunduma harkar rubuta wadannan labarai, domin haska musu hanya ta gyara da inganta su, duba da yadda suka samu karbuwa a idon masu karanta su
Hanyar sadarwar da aka fara samu ta samu ne a shekarar 1997, wadda take bai wa masu amfani da ita damar samar da karamin shafi da aka fi kira da profile
A shekarar 1999 ne kuma aka kirkiri damar samar da karamin shafi da ake kira blogging
Bayan samuwar kananan shafukan sada zumunta sai kuma aka sami yawaitar shafukan sada zumunta musamman daga shekarar 2000
Kagaggun labaran Hausa na shafukan sada zumunta, wadanda da Turanci ake kira Online Hausa Novels, kagaggun labarai ne da ake rubutawa a shafukan sada zumunta na zamani
Ana rubuta su yawanci a wayoyin hannu wadanda ake kira Android, tare da amfani da Cibiyar Sadarwa da ake kira Network, wadda take amfani da intanet
Bayan an rubuta, marubutan na watsawa a kananan shafukansu ko su tura a zauruka na WhatsApp  da Facebook da sauransu
A wasu lokuta kuma masoyansu ke bude ire-iren wadannan zauruka su tura labaran
Kamar yadda aka bayyana a sama, su dai wadannan labarai  ba a littafi ake rubuta su ba, ana rubutawa ne a wayoyin hannu da ake kira Android
Za a iya kiran wadannan labarai da "Adabi A Tafin Hannu", musamman idan aka yi duba da yadda waya take koyaushe a hannun jama'a yanzu

Dangane da tarihin samuwar kagaggun labaran shafukan sada zumunta na zamani, an samo bayanai daga bakin wasu marubutan wadannan shafuka da wasu masu karanta labaran, da cewa an fara rubuta su a shekarar  2013
Kawo yanzu, wadannan labarai kara bunkasa suke ta hanyar yawaita, tare da samun karuwar marubutan da makaranta
A wasu lokutan kuma su marubutan ne suke bude ire-iren wadannan kungiyoyi na whatsApp inda suke watsa wadannan labarai
Akwai marubuta wadannan labarai da yawa, ga wasu daga cikinsu da sunayen kananan shafukansu da wasu labaran da suka rubuta
Amma a bangare daya za a iya cewa ma fi yawan labaran da ake samar wa a kafafen sada zumunta na zamani suna karan-tsaye ga tarbiyya da aka san Bahaushe da ita
Domin akan sami sakin baki wato, suna bayyana batsa da munanan dabi'u da suka samo wadanda ba na Hausa ba
Duba da haka wannan takarda ta yi wani tsinkaye wanda za a iya cewa "gyara kayanka' ne, wanda Bahaushe yake cewa ' bai zai zamo sauke mu raba ba'
Domin matasa musamman mata da suke kokarin kwaikwayar rayuwa ta cikin wadannan labarai za su inganta zamantakewar gidan aurensu, haka zalika su ma maza
Sannan kuma hakan zai taimaka wajen magance matsalar mutuwar al'adun Hausawa na gargajiya
A makon da ya wuce ne wasu da ake zargin ƴan bindiga ne suka sace ƴan Kasuwar na Kantin Kwarin
Ƴan bindigar sun tare matasan waɗanda dukkansu ƴan jihar Kano ne, a kan hanyarsu ta zuwa Aba a cikin daren ranar Lahadi
"Mutanen suna da yawa amma ƴan kasuwar kwari su 18 ne kuma dukkaninsu an sada su ga iyalansu
"An biya kuɗin fansa kafin a sake su, amma ba zan fadi nawa ba ne aka biya saboda mafi mahimmanci dawowarsu ga iyalansu ba tare da wani rauni ko wata illa ba," in ji Dandago
Ya kuma ƙara da cewa akwai ƴan sauran kasuwanni kamar Kofar Wambai amma shi bai san halin da suke ciki ba
Ana aikewa da dakarun Tsaro na kasa daga ko'ina cikin kasar zuwa Washington DC, domin dakile barazanar maimaita mummunar tarzomar da ta faru a ranar 6 ga Janairu
An kafa shingayen binciken ababen hawa kan titunan babban birnin kasar cikin tsauraran matakan tsaro
A ranar Asabar ne yan sanda suka tabbatar da kama wani mutumi dan jihar Virginia da bindigogi da harsasai 509 da kuma lasisin shiga taron rantsuwar na bodi
Gwamnonin Maryland, da New Mexico da Utah duk sun ayyana dokar ta-baci gabanin yiwuwar samun zanga-zangar
A cewar darakta a Ma'aikatar Tsaron Jama'a ta Texas, bayanan sirri sun nuna cewa "masu tsattsauran ra'ayi" na iya kutsawa cikin zanga-zangar da aka shirya don "aikata muggan laifuka"
Ya shaida wa BBC cewa ɗaruruwan sojoji sun tare a gidansa tare da iyalinsa, baya ga cin zarafin wasu magoya bayansa da suka riƙa yi
Bobi Wine da sauran ƴan takara goma da suka shiga zaɓen sun yi zargin tafka maguɗi, da kuma hana wakilansu sanya ido
Kwana biyu kafin zaɓen ne hukumomi suka katse hanyoyin sadarwa, wanda Bobi Wine ya ce ya taimaka wajen boye cuwa cuwar da aka tafka
Museveni ya kuma gargadi 'yan adawa game da tashin hankali yana mai cewa gwamnati za ta hukunta su
An yi zanga-zanga nan da can a wasu garuruwan domin nuna goyon baya ga abokin hamayyarsa Robert Kyagulanyi wato Bobi Wine,
Kungiyoyin magoya bayansa sun yi bikin murna a Kampala da wasu garuruwa bayan an bayyana nasarar tasa
A sakamakon zaben, Museveni ya samu kashi 58
Ta hanyar yin tambaya da bayar da amsa
Mene ne Bitcoin, sannan ya ake amfani da shi?
Bitcoin Ba shi da siffa ta zahiri
Madadin haka, ana sayar da rukunin kuɗin a intanet da sauran shafukan sada zumunta
Ba shi da wata iyaka, ma'ana iya shafukan da za a iya amfani da su, sannan ba su da banki, kamar kudin zahiri da aka sani
Da wahala, a iya cewa ma ba zai yiwu a sauya shi ko a wawushe shi ba
Daga ina ya samo asali? An fara wallafa Bitcoin ne a wani jerin sakonni na intanet ga masana kimiyyar komfuta da ke karantar yadda za a iya aika sako ta intanet cikin tsaro a 2008
Wanda ya fara wallafa shi na da wani suna na bogi Satoshi Nakamoto amma babu wani mutum ko mutane kawo yanzu da aka tabbatar shi ne Satoshi
Don amfani da Bitcoins, matakin farko shi ne bude abin da ake kira 'wallet' ko lalita (wadda ke iya zama a intanet ko a manhajar waya ko a wata na'ura mai tsaro)
Wannan na kare duk wani sirri da ake amfani da shi wajen hadahadar bitcoins
Lalitarka za ta kunshi 'adireshi' wanda yake aiki kamar lambar asusun banki sannan ana iya amfani da shi wajen karbar bitcoins
Haka kuma zai kunshi password din da ake bukata wajen aika bitcoins
Yayin da ake sake ƙirƙirar kuɗi, yana rage daraja kuɗin da ake da shi
Ana samar da bitcoin ne sannu a hankali kuma a ƙayyade, sannan babu wanda zai iya ƙirkirar bitcoin a lokacin da ya so
Ba a taɓa iya samar da bitcoin sama da miliyan 21 ba; kuma ana iya raba ko wane bitcoin zuwa kashi miliyan 100, wanda ake kira Satoshis
Wannan zai hana raguwar darajarsa kamar yadda kudin da muka sani ke yi
Bitcoin na iya mayar da kai miloniya
Kamar ko wane hannun jari, yana faɗuwa da tashi kuma ya danganta da lokacin da ka siye shi
Yana iya mayar da kai miloniya kuma yana iya talauta ka
Me ake nufi da haƙar bitcoin? Haƙar bitcoin na nufin samar da sabbin bitcoin ta hanyar amfani da wasu abubuwa da ake kira 'blocks'
Shiga gasar na buƙatar masu amfani su sayi wata na'ura da aikinta shi ne kawai 'hakar' bitcoin wadda kuma take shan wutar lantarki sosai
Mutanen da ke wannan aikin ana kiransu masu haƙar bitcoin

Duk  wanda ya rubuto maka tes, idan wani abu yake bukata na bayani, wajibi ne ka rubuta ka aika masa, muddin kana da lokaci da kuma kudi a wayarka

Idan sako ne irin wanda ake turowa daga wannan zuwa wancan, wato "Chain Messages" ko "Forwarded Messages," irin wadannan sakonni suna daukan dayan fuska uku ne; na farko su ne sakonnin addu'o'i ko hadisai ingantattu, wadandan ana iya tura wa kowa
Domin babu suna a jikinsu, kowa na iya karantawa
Na biyu su ne wadanda suka kunshi fadakarwa kamar na baya, amma ta hanyar hadisan da basu inganta ba, ko labarun da suka kunshi wasu abubuwan da shari'a bata yarda da su ba
Irin wannan idan aka turo maka, kuma ka san kuskuren da ke cikinsu, to ba za ka tura wa wani ba
Watakila shi bai sani bane, shi yasa
Ma'ana fatan alheri yake maka

Misali, kwanakin baya akwai sako da yayi ta yawo cewa wata mata da ba musulma ba ta yi mafarkin Manzon Allah ya umarce ta da yin wasu abubuwa, wanda bayan ta farka, sai ta musulunta, sannan tace manzon Allah yace dole ne kowa yayi su, duk wanda bai yi su ba, to, zai ga tashin hankali a rayuwarsa
Wannan sakon wani mai karatu ya turo mini, sai na fadakar da shi kuskuren da ke ciki
Amma idan a cikin mafarkin aka ce wai wanda aka gani a matsayin Manzon Allah yace a yi wasu abubuwa wadanda suka saba wa shari'a, to a nan ba za a yi ba
Kuma hakan ke nuna cewa lallai wanda aka gani a mafarkin nan ba Manzon Allah bane
Domin Manzon Allah ba zai taba umartan wani daga cikin mabiyansa da wani sabon shari'a ba, ko abin da ya saba wa shari'a ba
Idan ya sifata Manzon Allah daidai da yadda hadisai suka nuna siffarsa, to a nan sai a yarda cewa lallai shi ya gani
